title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Invoke Content Camera on Desktop feature

description.newValue:
Currently, users must turn on sharing from a content camera in Microsoft Teams via the Share tray on the Teams Meeting stage.Â Moving forward, users will be able to start and stop sharing content directly from a certified Teams device. This feature enables presenters to share a Whiteboard, document, or video more quickly during a meeting.
GA date: March CY2023
